notes: If the target is more than 850 range away, the caster moves to the target until it is within 600 range before casting. If a cast order is given on a target which is within 850 range already, the caster does not need to move closer and casts it right away.
The owner does not have to face the target to use this on it.
Successive casts on the same target do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
abilities.description: Targets a building, restoring 40% of its health over 30 seconds. Also grants +10 armor.
